recorded.buildCurriculumDescription: Add modules and upload videos to create your course content. Each module can contain multiple videos. Mark videos as "Preview" to allow non-enrolled users to watch them. You can also attach multiple course materials (PDFs, documents) to each video.

flexible.title: Flexible Learning

free.title: Free Access

howItWorks.title: How Tudva Works
howItWorks.intro: Tudva is built on the principle of flexible, community-driven learning. Here's a brief overview:

schedule.title: Create Your Schedule:
schedule.description: Students can configure their ideal learning day by selecting from a variety of courses.

courses.title: Live and Recorded Courses:
courses.description: Choose between interactive live sessions or flexible recorded content.

trainingRooms.title: Training Rooms:
trainingRooms.description: Institutions provide spaces for students to participate online together.

instructors.title: Volunteer Instructors:
instructors.description: Courses are created and led by passionate volunteers.

folder.title: Personal Learning Folder:
folder.description: Access course materials and recordings in your personal learning folder.

interaction.title: Community Interaction:
interaction.description: Connect with other learners and instructors, contributing to a supportive learning environment.

metadata.title: Get Started | Tudva
metadata.description: Learn how to get started with Tudva and begin your learning journey.

hero.title: Welcome to Tudva!
hero.subtitle: Ready to start learning? This guide will walk you through the basics of using the Tudva platform.

step1.title: Step 1: Create Your Free Account
step1.description: To access Tudva's courses, you'll need a free account. Click the Sign Up button in the top right corner of the page (or visit
step1.description2: ). You'll need to provide your email address, name, and choose a secure password. Don't forget to confirm your email address after signing up!

step2.title: Step 2: Browse the Course Catalog
step2.description: Once you're logged in, you can explore our wide range of courses. Go to the
step2.description2: page to see all available courses. You can filter by subject, format (live or recorded), and the day of the week the course is offered.

step3.title: Step 3: Configure Your Learning Day
step3.description: Tudva allows you to create a personalized weekly learning schedule. Currently, we offer courses on a specific day of the week (e.g., Wednesday). You can choose up to 6 lessons to fill your learning day.

list.item2: You'll see a list of available time slots for the designated learning day.
list.item3: Browse the available courses and click "Book" to add a course to a specific time slot.
list.item4: The system will automatically prevent you from booking conflicting courses.
list.item5: Once you've filled your schedule, you're ready to learn!

step4.title: Step 4: Attend Live Courses (or Watch Recordings)
step4.description: For live courses, join the session at the scheduled time. You'll be able to interact with the instructor and other learners via live chat. If you miss a live session, or if you've chosen a recorded course, you can find the recording in your personal learning folder.

step5.title: Step 5: Access Learning Materials
step5.description: Instructors can upload course materials (PDFs, audio files, etc.) to their courses. You can find these materials in your personal learning folder. Only the latest versions of materials are displayed, but older versions are archived for your reference.

step6.title: Step 6: Join the Community (Optional)
step6.description: Connect with other learners and instructors in our community forums (link to forums, if you have them). Share your experiences, ask questions, and learn from others.

metadata.title: Our Mission | Tudva
metadata.description: Learn about Tudva's mission to provide free, community-based, flexible education.

whatDrivesUs.title: What Drives Us
whatDrivesUs.lead: At Tudva, we believe that learning should be a lifelong pursuit, unconstrained by cost, location, or background. We're building a platform where knowledge is freely shared, communities thrive, and individuals are empowered to reach their full potential.
whatDrivesUs.vision: We envision a world where anyone, anywhere, can access the education they need to improve their lives and contribute to society.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Education is a right, not a privilege.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: High standards for content and experience.

metadata.title: What Does Tudva Mean | Tudva
metadata.description: Discover the meaning behind the name Tudva and how it reflects our mission and values.

content.paragraph1: "Tudva" is a Hungarian word that means "knowingly" or "with knowledge." It reflects our core values of knowledge, accessibility, community, and lifelong learning. We chose this name because it embodies the essence of conscious, intentional learning â€“ the idea that education should be pursued with awareness and purpose.
content.paragraph2: The word "Tudva" comes from the Hungarian verb "tudni," which means "to know." When you do something "tudva," you do it with full awareness and understanding. This perfectly captures our philosophy: learning should not be passive or accidental, but an active, informed choice that empowers individuals to grow and contribute to their communities.
content.paragraph3: By choosing this name, we wanted to emphasize that education on our platform is intentional and meaningful. Every course, every lesson, and every interaction is designed to help you learn "tudva" â€“ with knowledge, purpose, and understanding. We believe that when you learn consciously, you not only gain knowledge but also develop the wisdom to apply it effectively in your life.
content.conclusion: We hope that the name "Tudva" will inspire you on your learning journey!

metadata.title: Become a Teacher | Tudva
metadata.description: Share your knowledge and passion with the world. Learn how to become a volunteer instructor on Tudva.

hero.title: Become a Tudva Instructor
hero.subtitle: Share your expertise and passion with a global community of learners.

reasons.makeDifference: Make a Difference: Contribute to making high-quality education accessible to everyone.
reasons.sharePassion: Share Your Passion: Connect with students who are eager to learn what you know.
reasons.flexibleSchedule: Flexible Schedule: Create and deliver courses on your own terms, choosing times that work for you.
reasons.communitySupport: Community Support: Join a network of passionate volunteer instructors.
reasons.noFees: No Fees: Tudva is a free platform, both for learners and instructors.
reasons.easyTools: Easy-to-Use Tools: Our platform provides the tools you need to create and manage your courses, upload materials, and interact with students.

step1.text: Create an Account: If you don't already have one,
step1.linkText: register for a free Tudva account

steps.step2: Apply to Teach: Fill out our instructor application form [Link to Application Form - e.g., /become-teacher/apply]. Tell us about your expertise, the topics you'd like to teach, and your teaching experience (if any). Prior teaching experience is not required.
steps.step3: Review Process: Our team will review your application. We'll look for a clear passion for teaching, expertise in your chosen subject, and a commitment to Tudva's mission.
steps.step4: Get Approved: If your application is approved, you'll receive an email with instructions on how to get started.
steps.step5: Create Your Course: Use our platform's tools to create your course, including modules, schedules, and learning materials.
steps.step6: Start Teaching!: Connect with students and share your knowledge!

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.intro: While we welcome instructors of all backgrounds, we do have some basic requirements:

list.expertise: Expertise: You should have a strong understanding of the subject you want to teach.
list.passion: Passion: A genuine enthusiasm for sharing your knowledge with others.
list.commitment: Commitment: A willingness to dedicate the time needed to create and deliver high-quality courses.
list.communication: Communication Skills: The ability to communicate clearly and effectively with learners.
list.technical: Technical Proficiency: Basic computer skills and the ability to use our online platform.

metadata.title: Learning Rooms | Tudva
metadata.description: Discover Tudva Learning Rooms: collaborative spaces for online learning.

hero.title: Tudva Learning Rooms
hero.subtitle: Experience the power of collaborative learning in a supportive environment.

whatAre.title: What are Learning Rooms?
whatAre.paragraph1: Tudva Learning Rooms are physical spaces, provided by institutions and organizations, where students can gather to participate in Tudva's online courses together. They offer a dedicated environment for focused learning, fostering a sense of community and providing access to resources that might not be available at home.
whatAre.paragraph2: Learning Rooms can be equipped with computers, reliable internet access, and headphones, allowing students to participate in live sessions and access recorded content without distractions. They're also a great place to connect with other learners in your area.

findNearYou.title: Find a Learning Room Near You
findNearYou.description: Use our interactive map to find a Tudva Learning Room in your area.
findNearYou.mapPlaceholder: Map/Search Placeholder. Integrate your map/search component here.
findNearYou.cantFind: Can't find a Learning Room near you? Contact us to suggest a potential location!

forInstitutions.title: For Institutions: Host a Learning Room
forInstitutions.intro: Are you an institution interested in providing a Tudva Learning Room? We'd love to partner with you! Hosting a Learning Room offers several benefits:

benefits.expandAccess: Expand access to education in your community.
benefits.provideResource: Provide a valuable resource for students who may lack access to technology or a quiet study space.
benefits.fosterCommunity: Foster a sense of community and collaboration among learners.
benefits.enhanceReputation: Enhance your institution's reputation as a supporter of lifelong learning.

forInstitutions.outro: To learn more about hosting a Learning Room, please contact us.

tagline.title: Free access to high-quality education
tagline.description: Together we enable lifelong learning for all - free of charge and community-based.
